content: lion brand pattern # chs-greatlengthsafghan published in crochet magazine knit it michael s create skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 4 colors 8 balls total suggested colorways 1 delft sunshine state colonial deco 2 montana sky coral gables sunshine state florida keys green 3 williamsburg sunshine state seaspray boston rose 4 ranch gothic baroque corinthian 5 antique romanesque boston rose seaspray 6 edwardian rococo shaker deco crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge each completed square measures approximately 11 28 cm afghan is 4 squares by 5 squares a total of 20 squares in 4 different color sequences there are 9 rounds in each square alternating colors whip stitch squares together into 5 strips of 4 squares each whip stitch strips together crochet border to finish *free registration at site required to access pattern *
